00030 /*
00031  * The typedef above replaces the following class. Its functionallity is already provided by
00032  * boost::ublas. It may be, that the boost implementation is significantly slower because it is
00033  * designed for quite large vectors. But if we realize that vector arithmetic is an efficiency
00034  * problem, we can still implement our own vector class using the same interface as boost.
00035  * -peter
00036  */
